summary:
Undertale is a popular video game where you play as a kid who falls into a hidden world called the Underground. You meet friendly monsters but some want to fight. You can choose to fight or befriend them. Your choices change the story and how characters act.

Toby Fox made the game by himself, taking inspiration from other games and shows. It became very successful, winning many awards and being called one of the best games ever. It's available on many platforms and has even led to a new game called Deltarune.
title: Undertale
